svg.sodipodi:docname: Payment routing - SSI routing - Architecture overview.svg

text.tspan: Idempotent data load from external data sources. Carefully selected UNIQUE keys for every entity ensure correct data load or update even on repeated data load of the same data
Routing SSI holds a mapping between the owner BIC and
for a given currency and routing SSI source combination.
Routing SSI holds routing SSI from multiple sources (SWIFT, PAGOFX).
Routing SSI allows for routing SSI chains to be encoded recursively
where we start with the owner BIC and currency and recursively go
down the chain on LOCAL_CORRESPONDENTs till find the final (direct)
Recursively get all available routing SSI options for a given owner BIC and currency combination
from all availalbe routing SSI sources (SWIFT, PAGOFX). Priority and preffered correspondent
may be indicated in the internal data model to order all availalbe routing SSI options in order
SEPA routing provides the information about beneficiry
payment institution BIC and address, as well as SEPA
scheme, payment channel, and reachability of beneficiary
